title: Traits and Features

Draconic Bloodline (Lvl 1 - Sorcerer Subclass) Draconic Ancestry: Copper (Acid) Passive Feature At Level 6, spells that deal Acid damage are more powerful, and you can become resistant to Acid damage. Draconic Bloodline (Lvl 1 - Sorcerer Subclass) Draconic Ancestry: Bronze (Lightning) Passive Feature At Level 6, spells that deal Lightning damage are more powerful, and you can become resistant to Lightning damage.
